Operation: Add material to the existing solid body. **Instructions for Part 3** **Construction of a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom.** Begin by creating a new coordinate system at position (0.5967, 0.3, 0.0375) with no rotations. Create a new sketch with a single face on the XY plane. 1. Create the first loop as a quadrilateral with lines connecting (0, 0), (0.15, 0), (0.15, 0.15), and (0, 0.15). Extrude the sketch using the following parameters: 1. Extrusion depth towards normal: 0.0466 2. Extrusion depth opposite normal: 0.0 3. Sketch scale: 0.15 4. Operation: Add material to the existing solid body.</description>
